description.narrative: The project will provide priority sanitation infrastructure identified in the Koror-Airai Sanitation Master Plan (KASMP).

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved delivery of sanitation services by PPUC.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

By 2024
Sewer overflows to the land and sea reported to EQPB reduced by 50% (baseline: 2013 average to be established during early implementation).

description.narrative: Improved delivery of sanitation services by PPUC.

title.narrative: Treatment system outflow from the discharged pipe in Koror and Airai consistently meets EQPB standards.
